channel.title: Need a good anti dupe method
channel.description: There has been a very bad duping problem on my server. I have a method.. but people found a new way to come around it.. originally it was the trade glitch and now it still is.. my method just deleted the trade timer to kick them out of trade. but they did a total opposite of the dupe then usual. if anyone has the method to where it will delete the items in trade. once they press accept and decline i would appreciate it. what i mean is if a player clicks accept and decline then all items in the trade will dissappear for good. i would appreciate it a lot. and im willing to rep if possible.

item.title: Need a good anti dupe method
item.dc:creator: @BlacknRaven BlacknRaven
item.description:
@BlacknRaven wrote:

here is my code :

public boolean destroyItem(int item) { for(int i = 0; i < noTrade.length; i++) { if(noTrade[i] == item) return true; } return false; }

Read full topic
item.source: Need a good anti dupe method

item.title: Need a good anti dupe method
item.dc:creator: @bloodmaniet bloodmaniet
item.description:
@bloodmaniet wrote:

no lol i meant that its just the trade method. they cannot telegrab i took out. and ive tested all other dupes. so like its just the trade dupe. i just need a method to delete the items once a player clicks accept and decline.

Read full topic

There has been a very bad duping problem on my server. I have a method… but people found a new way to come around it… originally it was the trade glitch and now it still is… my method just deleted the trade timer to kick them out of trade. but they did a total opposite of the dupe then usual. if anyone has the method to where it will delete the items in trade. once they press accept and decline i would appreciate it.
what i mean is if a player clicks accept and decline then all items in the trade will dissappear for good. i would appreciate it a lot. and im willing to rep if possible.
